document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Gyllenhal, L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Gyllenhal, L. (1835) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyilenhal, C. H. Boheman, el entomologis aliis illustratae. Tomus tertius. - Pars prima. [1836], Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 505 pp. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 8952

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. South Europe, West Asia; introduced to North America ( Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined.
143 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , NSPU , ZMUM , IMC ) from 15 provinces were studied.
Cherkasy Prov.
:
3 spec. ( ZMUM ) Korsun-Shevchenkivskyi , bank of Dnieper River ,
on
Centaurea arenaria , Ter-Minasian
leg.,
23.vii.1933
;
1 spec. ( ZMUM ) Cherkasy Distr. , Verguny , A.F. Kryshtal leg.,
8.vi.1946
;
Crimea
: 1 spec. ( KUMN ) Rybachye near Alushta , S.I. Medvedev leg.,
21.vii.1972
;
2 spec. ( KUMN ) Yedi Quyu Distr. ,
21.vii.1972
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Armyansk , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
12.v.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Simferopol , A. Bazhenov ,
19.vi.1899
;
2 spec. ( ZIN ) Kerch , Kirichenko leg.,
10.v.1902
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) İslâm Terek Distr. , Agarmish Mt. , Kirichenko leg.,
9.vi.1906
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Shchebetovka [= Otuzi ]. near Feodosia , Kirichenko leg.,
18.vi.1901
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Bilohirsk Distr. , Karasivka, I. V . Maltsev leg.,
21.vii.1976
;

1.vi.1954
;

18.v.1983
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilohirsk Distr. , Grushivka ,
11.vi.1957
;

;

;
